front.title: SIP MARTINI with Other Logical Identifier Values which are not E.164 (OLIVE)

abstract.t: The Martini Working Group is defining a mechanism for SIP IP-PBX type devices to REGISTER and obtain SIP service for E.164-based Address of Records. This document defines a means for other, non- E.164 AoRs to be used with Martini-based IP-PBXs.
